Ingredients.3: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger raspberry flavored liqueur

Directions.1: Salt the rim of a large margarita glass. To do so, pour salt onto a small plate, moisten the rim of the glass on a damp towel and press into the salt.

Directions.2: In a cocktail mixer full of ice, combine tequila, sour mix and raspberry liqueur. Shake vigorously and strain into salt rimmed glass.
